messages.content: Is it harbor or urban area?

Why do flat water bodies typically appear as dark regions in SAR images?
Flat water bodies typically appear as dark regions in SAR images.
Why do flat water bodies typically appear as dark regions in SAR images?
Bare soil
Why do flat water bodies typically appear as dark regions in SAR images?

Flat water bodies appear as dark regions in SAR images because of the high attenuation of the satellite signals. The sea is a large, water-covered area, and the satellite's signal is absorbed, causing it to appear in a lower left of the image.
